How to Certify the First House
How to Certify the First House

A builder must: • Join the local HBA • Join the EarthCraft House program • Sign ENERGY STAR partnership agreement • Attend EarthCraft House training • Schedule a design review • Submit a Scoring Worksheet • Schedule a pre-drywall inspection • Schedule and pass a final inspection
